page.title: 03Chemists.
page.content: We visited the{Country Pharmacy,}run by Mr. and Mrs. Parker.The shop is a {Vantage}chemist.Mrs.Parker has worked in the shop for 11-12 years.She enjoys meeting people,and is pleased to welcome newcomers.The shop has been modernised recently with new displays. The{dispensary}used to be at the back but now it is just inside the door. Mrs.Parker works about 42 hours a week.She makes up prescriptions and sells toiletries.She also fills shelves, checks stock and does paper work.She starts work just before 9:00 a.m. Mrs Parker likes her job,but finds some parts boring.
